The study conduct 8 investigational site 2007-2008 Texas Mountain Cedar allergy season . After 7-day Placebo Lead-In Period ( Day -7 Day 1 ) , subject instructed take placebo lead-in medication twice daily ( 1 spray per nostril ) , approximately every 12 hour . On Day 1 , subject satisfy symptom severity requirement continue meet study inclusion/exclusion criterion randomize 1:1:1:1 ratio receive 1 spray per nostril twice daily MP29-02 , azelastine hydrochloride , fluticasone propionate , placebo nasal spray .
